title: LINOVISION Industrial 5 Ports Gigabit Solar POE Switch with DC9V-54V to DC48V Voltage Booster,4 x IEEE802.3af/at 30W POE Ports @120W, IP40, Compact POE Power for Solar Power/RV Truck/VoIP Systems
features: DC9V-54V POE SWITCH: Support DC9V-54V input and standard IEEE802.3af/at POE output with built-in voltage booster. (Noted: Only Mode B POE output is supported, if your POE Device is Mode A, pls buy 8 port POE Switch: ASIN B089LGKZQR)

5-PORT FULL GIGABIT POE SWITCH: Provide 4 IEEE802.3af/at 30W POE ports and 1 Gigabit uplink; All ports 10/100/1000Mbps self-adaptive full duplex; Total POE budget 120W (DC24V/DC48V input) or 60W (DC12V input).
INDUSTRIAL DESIGN: Compact IP40 rugged metal enclosure; Wide working temperature (-40 ℉ to 176 ℉); Support DIN-Rail & Wall Mount.
NON-STOP POE SUPPLY WITH DUAL POWER INPUT: Support 2 channel DC12V-48V redundant power inputs and auto failover, ensure high reliability networking system. Compatible with Mode B POE outputs only.
APPLICATIONS: Standard POE supply in solar power system (DC12V/DC18V/DC36V input), RV/Vehicle/Truck/Bus (DC12V input), VoIP/Access control systems (DC24V input).

LINOVISION Industrial 5 Ports Gigabit Solar POE Switch with DC9V-54V to DC48V Voltage Booster, Supports 4 x IEEE802.3af/at 30W POE Ports @120W, Compact POE Power Supply for Solar Power/RV Truck/VoIP Systems. Outstanding Features Full Gigabit PoE Switch 4 IEEE802.3af/at 30W POE ports and 1 Gigabit uplink All ports 10/100/1000Mbps self-adaptive full duplex Total POE budget 120W (DC24V/48V) or 60W (DC12V) PD Detection PoE port supports PoE automatic detection. When connecting to a non-POE device, provide data transmission only, will not output power to prevent damage Mini POE Switch Compact design, DIN rail or Wa mounting easily fit into small cabinets or machines. Redundant Power Support 2 channel DC9V-54V redundant power inputs and auto failover, ensure high reliability networking system.
